/* PayslipMapper.ListPayslip */
WITH A00_BASE AS ( SELECT P.PAYSLIP_ID, SUM(PD.SALARY_AMOUNT) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM SA_PAYSLIP P LEFT JOIN SA_PAYSLIP_SALARY_DETAIL PD ON PD.PAYSLIP_ID = P.PAYSLIP_ID WHERE PD.SALARY_TYPE_CODE = 'A00' GROUP BY P.PAYSLIP_ID ), B00_BASE AS ( SELECT P.PAYSLIP_ID, SUM(PD.SALARY_AMOUNT) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM SA_PAYSLIP P LEFT JOIN SA_PAYSLIP_SALARY_DETAIL PD ON PD.PAYSLIP_ID = P.PAYSLIP_ID WHERE PD.SALARY_TYPE_CODE = 'B00' GROUP BY P.PAYSLIP_ID ) SELECT P.PAYSLIP_ID, P.EMPLOYEE_ID, P.WORK_HISTORY_ID, P.PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD, CASE WHEN CHAR_LENGTH(P.PAYSLIP_NOTE) > 100 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(P.PAYSLIP_NOTE, 1, 100), '...') ELSE IFNULL(P.PAYSLIP_NOTE, '-') END AS PAYSLIP_NOTE, FORMAT(IFNULL(SUM(A00.TOTAL_AMOUNT), 0), 0) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT_A00, FORMAT(IFNULL(SUM(B00.TOTAL_AMOUNT), 0), 0) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT_B00, FORMAT(IFNULL(SUM(A00.TOTAL_AMOUNT), 0) - IFNULL(SUM(B00.TOTAL_AMOUNT), 0), 0) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM SA_PAYSLIP P LEFT JOIN A00_BASE A00 ON A00.PAYSLIP_ID = P.PAYSLIP_ID LEFT JOIN B00_BASE B00 ON B00.PAYSLIP_ID = P.PAYSLIP_ID WHERE P.WORK_HISTORY_ID = @WorkHistoryId
AND P.EMPLOYEE_ID = @EmployeeId
GROUP BY P.PAYSLIP_ID ORDER BY P.EMPLOYEE_ID DESC, P.PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD DESC
